title: Movie Streaming Service Genre Ranking
problem_statement:
SQL: Movie Streaming Service Genre Ranking

During the development of a movie streaming service, a query is needed to return a list of movie genres and the best movie in that genre based on the maximum average review rating.

The result should have the following columns:

  • genre - genre name
  • title - movie title
  • stars - rating of the movie in stars format:

Record format is a repeating number of stars from 1 to 5, which is the average rating of reviews rounded to the nearest whole number.

The result should be sorted in ascending order by genre.

Input Format

The input consists of two tables:

Schema

Table Column Type Constraint Description
movies id INT PRIMARY KEY Movie ID
movies title VARCHAR(255) Movie title
movies genre VARCHAR(255) Movie genre
reviews movie_id INT FOREIGN KEY (movie_id → movies.id) Movie ID
reviews rating SMALLINT Review rating

Output Format

Return the result set with the columns: genre, title, and stars.

Constraints

  • 1 ≤ |genre|, |title| ≤ 255
  • 1 ≤ rating ≤ 5

Examples

Input:
movies table:
+----+----------------+----------+
| id | title          | genre    |
+----+----------------+----------+
| 1  | Movie A       | Action   |
| 2  | Movie B       | Comedy   |
| 3  | Movie C       | Action   |
+----+----------------+----------+

reviews table:
+----------+--------+
| movie_id | rating |
+----------+--------+
| 1        | 5      |
| 1        | 4      |
| 2        | 3      |
| 3        | 2      |
| 3        | 5      |
+----------+--------+
Output:
+----------+----------+-------+
| genre    | title    | stars |
+----------+----------+-------+
| Action   | Movie A  | ***** |
| Action   | Movie C  | ****  |
| Comedy   | Movie B  | ***   |
+----------+----------+-------+

The average ratings for the movies are calculated, and the best movie in each genre is selected based on the maximum average rating.
